title: plot_theme — plot_theme
text: main_font Font used text elements except title. Default "sans". title_font Font used title. Default "sans". hjust Horizontal alignment title, subtitle, caption. Default 0. text_col Text colour. Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white".

rep_df — rep_df
text: df dataframe replicated. times integer-valued vector giving (non-negative) number times repeat element length length(x), repeat whole vector length 1. Negative NA values error. double vector accepted, inputs coerced integer double vector. length.non-negative integer. desired length output vector. inputs coerced double vector first element taken. Ignored NA invalid. non-negative integer. element x repeated times. inputs coerced integer double vector first element taken. Treated 1 NA invalid.

text: Create heatmap showing values dataframe missing.
